message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $160. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but $160 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $140?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $152. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings!
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $145?
I'm getting close to your target price, Bob! I can offer the product to you for $148. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price!
I'm getting close to your target price too, Alice! Would you be willing to meet me at $142?
I'm willing to make one more concession, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $146. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $138?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can offer the product to you for $144. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price!
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway. Would you be willing to go down to $140?
